_meanings:
{@--5@} A subject or
topic (of discourse or controversy).

{@--15@} Gain. 

({#prasaMgena, prasaMgataH, prasaMgAt#} are used 
adverbially in the sense of {@--1@}  in 
relation to. {@--2@} in consequence of, on
account of, because of, by way of.
{@--3@} occasionally, incidentally. {@--4@} in
course of; as in {#kaTAprasaMgena#} in course
of conversation’).

prevention or obviation of similar
contingencies in future.

according to the time, by the force
of circumstances.
